  <entry>
    <id>tag:github.com,2008:Repository/112150776/v2.0.0-beta.1</id>
    <updated>2023-01-18T19:23:05Z</updated>
    <link rel="alternate" type="text/html" href="https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/releases/tag/v2.0.0-beta.1"/>
    <title>Eleventy v2.0.0-beta.1, the very first beta release of Eleventy 2.0</title>
    <content type="html">&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;g-emoji class=&quot;g-emoji&quot; alias=&quot;rotating_light&quot; fallback-src=&quot;https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/1f6a8.png&quot;&gt;🚨&lt;/g-emoji&gt; The full release notes are available on &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/blog/eleventy-v2-beta/&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;The Eleventy Blog: The Very First Beta Release of Eleventy v2.0&lt;/a&gt; or you can &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TcTR0TLqM3I&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;watch me talk about this release on YouTube&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;The very first Eleventy 2.0 Beta release is now available on the &lt;code&gt;@beta&lt;/code&gt; channel and we’re looking for Beta testers! You can try it out now:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;highlight highlight-source-shell notranslate position-relative overflow-auto&quot; data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content=&quot;# Local project
npm install @11ty/eleventy@beta

# Global install
npm install @11ty/eleventy@beta -g&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;pl-c&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;pl-c&quot;&gt;#&lt;/span&gt; Local project&lt;/span&gt;
npm install @11ty/eleventy@beta

&lt;span class=&quot;pl-c&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;pl-c&quot;&gt;#&lt;/span&gt; Global install&lt;/span&gt;
npm install @11ty/eleventy@beta -g&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Read more about &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/global-installation/&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;local versus global installation&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;New to Eleventy? Eleventy is a flexible and production-ready site generator known for its zero-client JavaScript footprint, &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/performance/&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;speedy sites, speedy builds&lt;/a&gt;, and &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b4frtsT4Cgo&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;full control over the output&lt;/a&gt;. Watch &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EZfNr-YblBE&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;The State of Eleventy in Two Minutes&lt;/a&gt; or &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;read more about Eleventy’s project goals.&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;h2&gt;The Big Features&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;h3&gt;Smaller, More Secure&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;g-emoji class=&quot;g-emoji&quot; alias=&quot;white_check_mark&quot; fallback-src=&quot;https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2705.png&quot;&gt;✅&lt;/g-emoji&gt; Dependencies decreased by &lt;strong&gt;32.1%&lt;/strong&gt;: &lt;a href=&quot;https://npmgraph.js.org/?q=@11ty/eleventy@2.0.0-beta.1&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;211 modules&lt;/a&gt; (&lt;a href=&quot;https://npmgraph.js.org/?q=@11ty/eleventy@1.0.2&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;311 in v1.0.2&lt;/a&gt;)&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;g-emoji class=&quot;g-emoji&quot; alias=&quot;white_check_mark&quot; fallback-src=&quot;https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2705.png&quot;&gt;✅&lt;/g-emoji&gt; &lt;code&gt;node_modules&lt;/code&gt; file weight decreased by &lt;strong&gt;77.8%&lt;/strong&gt;: 34.3 MB (155 MB in v1.0.2)&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;g-emoji class=&quot;g-emoji&quot; alias=&quot;white_check_mark&quot; fallback-src=&quot;https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2705.png&quot;&gt;✅&lt;/g-emoji&gt; &lt;a href=&quot;https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1lkeWOhEXTNh0yxWaNOl_UFOHQea2YnSHit4QLjqXUb8/edit?usp=sharing&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;&lt;strong&gt;30.5% faster&lt;/strong&gt; &lt;code&gt;npm install&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;h3&gt;Faster Builds&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Improved build performance (tested on &lt;a href=&quot;https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1-H3wmT7q7m7G7d5M_dCLxQOiAAX3TP0byQdf0pP1fAQ/edit?usp=sharing&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;a sample 500 page site&lt;/a&gt; against v1.0.2) using:
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Liquid: &lt;g-emoji class=&quot;g-emoji&quot; alias=&quot;white_check_mark&quot; fallback-src=&quot;https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2705.png&quot;&gt;✅&lt;/g-emoji&gt; &lt;strong&gt;18.18% faster&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Nunjucks: &lt;g-emoji class=&quot;g-emoji&quot; alias=&quot;white_check_mark&quot; fallback-src=&quot;https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2705.png&quot;&gt;✅&lt;/g-emoji&gt; &lt;strong&gt;17.74% faster&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Markdown (with Liquid): &lt;g-emoji class=&quot;g-emoji&quot; alias=&quot;white_check_mark&quot; fallback-src=&quot;https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2705.png&quot;&gt;✅&lt;/g-emoji&gt; &lt;strong&gt;17.95% faster&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;JavaScript (11ty.js): &lt;g-emoji class=&quot;g-emoji&quot; alias=&quot;white_check_mark&quot; fallback-src=&quot;https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2705.png&quot;&gt;✅&lt;/g-emoji&gt; &lt;strong&gt;8.33% faster&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/usage/incremental/&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;&lt;code&gt;--incremental&lt;/code&gt; for incremental builds&lt;/a&gt; &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/issues/108#issuecomment-1362030361&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;issue&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/issues/108/hovercard&quot;&gt;#108&lt;/a&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Smarter incremental builds with support for layout dependencies, &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/languages/custom/#registering-dependencies&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;registered dependencies on custom templates&lt;/a&gt;, dependencies in &lt;code&gt;pagination&lt;/code&gt; data or &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/collections/#declare-your-collections-for-incremental-builds&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;&lt;code&gt;eleventyImport&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/a&gt; &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/issues/975&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;issue&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/issues/975/hovercard&quot;&gt;#975&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/usage/#ignore-initial-to-run-eleventy-without-an-initial-build&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;&lt;code&gt;--ignore-initial&lt;/code&gt; command line option&lt;/a&gt; to skip the first build (best paired with &lt;code&gt;--incremental&lt;/code&gt;)&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Use &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/copy/#emulate-passthrough-copy-during-serve&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;emulated passthrough copy&lt;/a&gt; to serve passthrough files directly without triggering a build (will still work with live reload) &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/issues/2456&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;issue&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/issues/2456/hovercard&quot;&gt;#2456&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;h3&gt;Plugins&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Support for &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/languages/webc/&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;WebC, the new single file format for web components&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/plugins/edge/&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;Eleventy Edge&lt;/a&gt; will render Eleventy templates in an Edge Function for dynamic content &lt;em&gt;(bundled with Eleventy)&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/dev-server/&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;Eleventy Dev Server&lt;/a&gt; replaces Browsersync, adds support for DOM-diffing live reloads. &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/issues/1305&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;issue&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/issues/1305/hovercard&quot;&gt;#1305&lt;/a&gt; &lt;em&gt;(bundled with Eleventy)&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/plugins/render/&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;Render Plugin&lt;/a&gt; will render any template syntax inside other files &lt;em&gt;(bundled with Eleventy)&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/plugins/i18n/&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;Internationalization (i18n) Plugin&lt;/a&gt; makes it easy to create localized sites &lt;em&gt;(bundled with Eleventy)&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/plugins/html-base/&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;HTML &lt;code&gt;&amp;lt;base&amp;gt;&lt;/code&gt; Plugin&lt;/a&gt; makes it easy to deploy your site to any folder path without changing any content (works great with the path prefix feature) &lt;em&gt;(bundled with Eleventy)&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Support for the &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/server-vite/&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;Vite plugin&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;h3&gt;And more…&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Support for &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/languages/custom/#aliasing-an-existing-template-language&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;aliasing to an existing template language&lt;/a&gt; &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/issues/2248#issuecomment-1341732716&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;issue&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/issues/2248/hovercard&quot;&gt;#2248&lt;/a&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;This unlocks TypeScript or JSX in Eleventy when you use &lt;code&gt;esbuild-register&lt;/code&gt; and alias &lt;code&gt;11ty.ts&lt;/code&gt; or &lt;code&gt;11ty.tsx&lt;/code&gt; to &lt;code&gt;11ty.js&lt;/code&gt;.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/events/#event-arguments&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;Event arguments&lt;/a&gt; unlock new plugin abilities: &lt;code&gt;dir&lt;/code&gt; (input/output/includes/data/layouts locations),&lt;br&gt;
&lt;code&gt;outputMode&lt;/code&gt; (where the templates are going: &lt;code&gt;fs&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;code&gt;json&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;code&gt;ndjson&lt;/code&gt;), &lt;code&gt;runMode&lt;/code&gt; (&lt;code&gt;build&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;code&gt;watch&lt;/code&gt;, or &lt;code&gt;serve&lt;/code&gt;), or &lt;code&gt;results&lt;/code&gt; for the processed Eleventy output.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Memory usage improvements to &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/pagination/&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;Pagination&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;h2&gt;Breaking Changes&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;&lt;g-emoji class=&quot;g-emoji&quot; alias=&quot;warning&quot; fallback-src=&quot;https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/26a0.png&quot;&gt;⚠️&lt;/g-emoji&gt; Rather than review this list, it’d be faster to use the &lt;code&gt;eleventy-upgrade-helper&lt;/code&gt; plugin, which runs a suite of tests to see whether or not you need to worry about these breaking changes in your project: &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy-upgrade-help&quot;&gt;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy-upgrade-help&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Bump minimum Node version to &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/nodejs/release#release-schedule&quot;&gt;Node 14+&lt;/a&gt; &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/issues/2336&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;issue&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/issues/2336/hovercard&quot;&gt;#2336&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/languages/markdown/#indented-code-blocks&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;Disable indented code blocks in Markdown&lt;/a&gt; by default &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/issues/2438&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;issue&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/issues/2438/hovercard&quot;&gt;#2438&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/ignores/#configuration-api-added-in-v1.0.0&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;Both &lt;code&gt;.git&lt;/code&gt; and nested &lt;code&gt;node_modules&lt;/code&gt; folders are ignored by default&lt;/a&gt; (previously we ignored &lt;code&gt;node_modules/**&lt;/code&gt;, now &lt;code&gt;**/node_modules/**&lt;/code&gt;) &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/issues/2436&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;issue&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/issues/2436/hovercard&quot;&gt;#2436&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/data-eleventy-supplied/#fileslug&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;Dates will now be stripped from the parent directory for &lt;code&gt;page.fileSlug&lt;/code&gt; when the file name is &lt;code&gt;index.*&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/a&gt;. e.g. &lt;code&gt;YYYY-MM-DD-myslug/index.md&lt;/code&gt; has a &lt;code&gt;page.fileSlug&lt;/code&gt; of &lt;code&gt;myslug&lt;/code&gt; when previously it was &lt;code&gt;YYYY-MM-DD-myslug&lt;/code&gt; &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/issues/1947&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;issue&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/issues/1947/hovercard&quot;&gt;#1947&lt;/a&gt; &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/pull/2111&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;pull_request&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/pull/2111/hovercard&quot;&gt;#2111&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Dots in global data file names should be preserved in key name for data cascade &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/issues/1242&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;issue&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/issues/1242/hovercard&quot;&gt;#1242&lt;/a&gt; &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/pull/1912&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;pull_request&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/pull/1912/hovercard&quot;&gt;#1912&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Removes deprecated in v1.0 (and undocumented) &lt;code&gt;renderData&lt;/code&gt; feature (use Computed Data instead) &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/issues/2356&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;issue&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/issues/2356/hovercard&quot;&gt;#2356&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Removes &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/data-preprocessing/&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;pre-processing global JSON data files with a template language&lt;/a&gt; &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/issues/2728&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;issue&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/issues/2728/hovercard&quot;&gt;#2728&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Removes &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/copy/#passthrough-everything&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;&lt;code&gt;--passthroughall&lt;/code&gt; command line flag&lt;/a&gt; &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/issues/2682&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;issue&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/issues/2682/hovercard&quot;&gt;#2682&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Major dependency bumps:
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;code&gt;liquidjs&lt;/code&gt; from v9 to v10 &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/harttle/liquidjs/releases/tag/v10.0.0&quot;&gt;Release notes&lt;/a&gt;  &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/issues/2678&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;issue&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/issues/2678/hovercard&quot;&gt;#2678&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;code&gt;luxon&lt;/code&gt; from v2 to v3 &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/moment/luxon/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#300-2022-07-09&quot;&gt;Release notes&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;code&gt;markdown-it&lt;/code&gt; from v12 to v13 &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/markdown-it/markdown-it/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#1300---2022-04-22&quot;&gt;Release notes&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;h2&gt;The Small Features&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Adds support for configuration default file names &lt;code&gt;eleventy.config.js&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;code&gt;eleventy.config.cjs&lt;/code&gt; in addition to &lt;code&gt;.eleventy.js&lt;/code&gt; &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/issues/1029&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;issue&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/issues/1029/hovercard&quot;&gt;#1029&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/shortcodes/#asynchronous-universal-shortcodes&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;&lt;code&gt;addShortcode&lt;/code&gt; is now async-friendly&lt;/a&gt; &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/issues/2726&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;issue&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/issues/2726/hovercard&quot;&gt;#2726&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/filters/#asynchronous-universal-filters&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;&lt;code&gt;addFilter&lt;/code&gt; is now async-friendly&lt;/a&gt; &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/issues/2536&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;issue&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/issues/2536/hovercard&quot;&gt;#2536&lt;/a&gt; (also adds an &lt;code&gt;addAsyncFilter&lt;/code&gt; API method)&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;File watching:
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Eleventy Dev Server includes a &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/dev-server/#options&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;&lt;code&gt;watch&lt;/code&gt; option&lt;/a&gt; to trigger live reloads on file changes outside of your Eleventy build. Works great when you’re using a bundler in parallel!&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Decoupled ignore APIs for template processing (&lt;code&gt;eleventyConfig.ignores&lt;/code&gt;) and &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/watch-serve/#configuration-api&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;file watching (&lt;code&gt;eleventyConfig.watchIgnores&lt;/code&gt;)&lt;/a&gt; &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/issues/893&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;issue&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/issues/893/hovercard&quot;&gt;#893&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Access &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/copy/#advanced-options&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;advanced &lt;code&gt;recursive-copy&lt;/code&gt; options in passthrough file copy&lt;/a&gt; &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/pull/1686&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;pull_request&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/pull/1686/hovercard&quot;&gt;#1686&lt;/a&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Unlocks passthrough copy with symlinks &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/issues/530&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;issue&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/issues/530/hovercard&quot;&gt;#530&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/filters/log/#using-log-in-filter-chains&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;&lt;code&gt;log&lt;/code&gt; filter supports chaining&lt;/a&gt; &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/pull/2467&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;pull_request&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/pull/2467/hovercard&quot;&gt;#2467&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Adds &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/dates/#setting-a-content-date-in-front-matter&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;new &lt;code&gt;git Created&lt;/code&gt; date option&lt;/a&gt; &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/pull/2468&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;pull_request&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/pull/2468/hovercard&quot;&gt;#2468&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Adds &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/data-custom/#usage-with-options&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;options for &lt;code&gt;read&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;code&gt;encoding&lt;/code&gt; to custom data formats&lt;/a&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;This unlocks using &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/data-custom/#feed-exif-image-data-into-the-data-cascade&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;binary files (like images) to populate the Data Cascade&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;h3&gt;Even Smaller Features&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/config/#change-file-suffix-for-data-files&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;&lt;code&gt;setDataFileSuffixes&lt;/code&gt; API method to customize Template and Directory data file suffixes&lt;/a&gt; (or opt-out of the Template and Directory Data Files feature) &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/issues/2681&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;issue&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/issues/2681/hovercard&quot;&gt;#2681&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/plugins/serverless/#compile-the-data-cascade-for-the-project&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;Serverless option &lt;code&gt;singleTemplateScope: false&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/a&gt; simplifies using collections in serverless mode. &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/issues/2736&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;issue&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/issues/2736/hovercard&quot;&gt;#2736&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;A variety of bug fixes for &lt;code&gt;--serve&lt;/code&gt; issues that required server restarts.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Data Consistency:
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;code&gt;this.page&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;code&gt;this.eleventy&lt;/code&gt; are now available on &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/shortcodes/#scoped-data-in-shortcodes&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;Shortcodes&lt;/a&gt;, &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/filters/#scoped-data-in-filters&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;&lt;g-emoji class=&quot;g-emoji&quot; alias=&quot;new&quot; fallback-src=&quot;https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/1f195.png&quot;&gt;🆕&lt;/g-emoji&gt; Filters&lt;/a&gt;, &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/config/#linters&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;&lt;g-emoji class=&quot;g-emoji&quot; alias=&quot;new&quot; fallback-src=&quot;https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/1f195.png&quot;&gt;🆕&lt;/g-emoji&gt; Linters&lt;/a&gt;, and &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/config/#transforms&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;&lt;g-emoji class=&quot;g-emoji&quot; alias=&quot;new&quot; fallback-src=&quot;https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/1f195.png&quot;&gt;🆕&lt;/g-emoji&gt; Transforms&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/collections/#collection-item-data-structure&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;&lt;code&gt;page&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;code&gt;content&lt;/code&gt; on Collection entries&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Adds &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/filters/collection-items/#getcollectionitemindex&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;&lt;code&gt;getCollectionItemIndex&lt;/code&gt; universal filter&lt;/a&gt; &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/issues/2676&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;issue&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/issues/2676/hovercard&quot;&gt;#2676&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Throw error on circular layout dependencies &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/pull/2076&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;pull_request&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/pull/2076/hovercard&quot;&gt;#2076&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Plugins can now reference &lt;code&gt;eleventyConfig.pathPrefix&lt;/code&gt; &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/issues/2526&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;issue&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/issues/2526/hovercard&quot;&gt;#2526&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/docs/pagination/#generating-an-empty-results-page&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;&lt;code&gt;generatePageOnEmptyData&lt;/code&gt; to generate an empty results page&lt;/a&gt; with an empty paginated data set &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/pull/1698&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;pull_request&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/pull/1698/hovercard&quot;&gt;#1698&lt;/a&gt; &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/issues/756&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;issue&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/issues/756/hovercard&quot;&gt;#756&lt;/a&gt; &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/issues/731&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;issue&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/issues/731/hovercard&quot;&gt;#731&lt;/a&gt; &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/pull/2208&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;pull_request&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/pull/2208/hovercard&quot;&gt;#2208&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Creating an empty JSON data file no longer throws an error &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/issues/2299&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;issue&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/issues/2299/hovercard&quot;&gt;#2299&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;h2&gt;Housekeeping&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Full issue list: &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/milestone/38?closed=1&quot;&gt;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/milestone/38?closed=1&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Full changelog: &lt;a class=&quot;commit-link&quot; href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/compare/v1.0.2...v2.0.0-beta.1&quot;&gt;&lt;tt&gt;v1.0.2...v2.0.0-beta.1&lt;/tt&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;h2&gt;Thank You Notes&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;p&gt;This project would not be possible without our lovely community. Thank you to everyone that built something with Eleventy (&lt;a href=&quot;/11ty/eleventy/blob/v2.0.0-beta.1/authors&quot;&gt;×669 authors on our web site!&lt;/a&gt;), wrote a blog post about Eleventy, &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/eleventy/graphs/contributors&quot;&gt;contributed code&lt;/a&gt;, wrote a plugins, &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/11ty/11ty-website/graphs/contributors&quot;&gt;helped with documentation&lt;/a&gt;, asked questions, answered questions, braved &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.11ty.dev/speedlify/&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;The Leaderboards&lt;/a&gt;, participated on Discord, filed issues, attended (or organized!) a meetup, said a kind word on social media &lt;g-emoji class=&quot;g-emoji&quot; alias=&quot;heart&quot; fallback-src=&quot;https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2764.png&quot;&gt;❤️&lt;/g-emoji&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;A &lt;strong&gt;huge thank you to &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.netlify.com/&quot; rel=&quot;nofollow&quot;&gt;Netlify&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;, especially:  &lt;a class=&quot;user-mention notranslate&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;user&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/users/biilmann/hovercard&quot; data-octo-click=&quot;hovercard-link-click&quot; data-octo-dimensions=&quot;link_type:self&quot; href=&quot;https://github.com/biilmann&quot;&gt;@biilmann&lt;/a&gt;, Chris Bach, Lauren Sell (alum), and Claire Knight, without whom this release would not have been possible.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;g-emoji class=&quot;g-emoji&quot; alias=&quot;trophy&quot; fallback-src=&quot;https://github.githubassets.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/1f3c6.png&quot;&gt;🏆&lt;/g-emoji&gt; A special thanks to &lt;a class=&quot;user-mention notranslate&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;user&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/users/pdehaan/hovercard&quot; data-octo-click=&quot;hovercard-link-click&quot; data-octo-dimensions=&quot;link_type:self&quot; href=&quot;https://github.com/pdehaan&quot;&gt;@pdehaan&lt;/a&gt; for their tireless contributions on the Eleventy Issue tracker.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Yet more thanks to the all star Discord Moderators and Meetup Coordinators &lt;a class=&quot;user-mention notranslate&quot; data-hovercard-type=&quot;user&quot; data-hovercard-url=&quot;/users/BenDMyers/hovercard&quot;
